events.catalyst: FDA decision on AQST-109 (epinephrine) for emergency treatment of allergic reactions
events.notes: Standard review, NDA filing

events.catalyst: FDA decision on sparsentan for focal segmental glomerulosclerosis (FSGS)
events.notes: Priority review, sNDA filing for FSGS indication. IgA nephropathy already approved.

events.catalyst: FDA decision on Anaphylm (epinephrine sublingual film) for emergency treatment of anaphylaxis
events.notes: Priority review

events.notes: Rare disease treatment

events.catalyst: FDA decision on reproxalap for dry eye disease
events.notes: Extended PDUFA date from original deadline

events.catalyst: FDA decision on deucravacitinib (Sotyktu) for psoriatic arthritis
events.notes: Label expansion for existing approved drug

events.catalyst: FDA decision on linerixibat for cholestatic pruritus in primary biliary cholangitis
events.notes: Rare disease indication

events.catalyst: Novartis acquisition of Avidity Biosciences expected to close
events.notes: $12B acquisition, $72/share (46% premium). Expected close in 2026, exact date TBD

events.catalyst: Novo Nordisk acquisition of Akero Therapeutics - COMPLETED
events.notes: $4.7B acquisition, $54/share + $6 CVR. MASH treatment focus. Deal closed Dec 9, 2025. AKRO delisted, now Novo subsidiary.

events.catalyst: Thermo Fisher acquisition of Clario expected to close
events.notes: $9.4B acquisition. Expected close early to mid-2026

events.catalyst: Johnson & Johnson acquisition of Halda Therapeutics expected to close
events.notes: $3.05B acquisition. Expected close Q1 2026

events.catalyst: Comcast spin-off of Versant Media Group distribution
events.notes: Record date 12/16/2025, distribution 1/2/2026, regular-way trading begins 1/5/2026

events.catalyst: Honeywell separation of Aerospace and Automation divisions
events.notes: Projected for second half of 2026. Two separate spinoffs planned

events.catalyst: Middleby Corporation spin-off of Industrial Processing Division
events.notes: Tax-free transaction. Expected completion by early 2026

events.catalyst: Strategic EP LLC filed 13D pursuing strategic deal to maximize shareholder value
events.notes: Recent 13D filing. Activist pursuing accretive transaction opportunities

events.catalyst: FDA decision on Cerezyme (imiglucerase) sBLA for Gaucher disease update
events.notes: Supplemental BLA; lower-volatility label/manufacturing update

events.catalyst: Elliott standstill expiration following Southwest settlement
events.notes: Standstill expires April 1, 2026; potential renewed activism

events.catalyst: Elliott Management $1B stake with CEO replacement proposal
events.notes: Tier-1 activist. Elliott acquired $1B+ stake (Dec 18, 2025) and proposed CEO candidate. High-priority campaign targeting leadership change.

events.catalyst: Starboard Value 5% stake as company reviews strategic options
events.notes: Tier-1 activist. Starboard revealed 5% stake (Dec 13, 2025) as Clearwater Analytics reviews strategic options. Potential sale process or operational improvements.

events.catalyst: Starboard Value 8% stake in Bill Holdings
events.notes: Tier-1 activist. Starboard took hefty 8% stake in Bill Holdings (payment software company). Potential operational improvements or strategic alternatives.

events.catalyst: FDA decision on tabelecleucel for EBV+ PTLD
events.notes: First-ever allogeneic T-cell therapy if approved. High priority.

events.catalyst: FDA decision on CUTX-101 for Menkes Disease
events.notes: Rolling NDA submission completed.
events.source: FDA PDUFA calendar, Fortress Biotech IR

events.catalyst: Hg acquisition of OneStream
events.notes: $6.4B definitive agreement. Expected close H1 2026.

events.catalyst: Fifth Third Bancorp acquisition of Comerica Incorporated
events.notes: Shareholder approval received. Expected close Q1 2026.

events.catalyst: Icahn Group 8.36% stake in Southwest Gas
events.notes: Tier-2 activist (Icahn). Recent 13D/A filing showing increased stake. Teno board resignation Dec 31.

events.catalyst: FDA decision on RGX-121 for Hunter Syndrome (MPS II)
events.notes: Gene therapy candidate.
